Uses of Interface
io.grpc.util.AdvancedTlsX509TrustManager.Closeable

  • Packages that use AdvancedTlsX509TrustManager.Closeable 
    Package Description
    io.grpc.util
    Utilities with advanced features in the core layer that user can optionally use.

    • Uses of AdvancedTlsX509TrustManager.Closeable in io.grpc.util

      Methods in io.grpc.util that return AdvancedTlsX509TrustManager.Closeable 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      AdvancedTlsX509TrustManager.Closeable AdvancedTlsX509TrustManager.updateTrustCredentialsFromFile(File trustCertFile, long period, TimeUnit unit, ScheduledExecutorService executor)
      Schedules a ScheduledExecutorService to read trust certificates from a local file path periodically, and update the cached trust certs if there is an update.
